# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a directory enumeration options value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An initial value for the structure composed as the bitwise OR of zero or more of the valid values.
title: init(rawValue:)
